question: Your Overseas friend has invited you to visit his country. You are planning to visit him.Write a letter to your friend, In your letter.•	Thank him for the invitation & accept the invitation.•	Write detail about your visit. •	Briefly describe what you want to do there.
text: I hope this letter finds you well. I was very happy after receiving your letter where you have asked me to visit India. I would love to visit you this summer.
I have booked a ticket for Indian Airways for 12 May  2022. I will reach Delhi Airport on 13 May at 5pm. Moreover, my return ticket has been confirmed for 1 June  2022.

During the trip, I would like to travel to different places all over the country which I could not see when I was a child. Firstly, I wish to see the Taj Mahal which is one of the seven wonders  of the world. Further, historic places like Amritsar, Fatehgarh Sahib and Hajoor Sahib will be suitable for travelling. In addition, it will be a good idea to recall all our childhood memories and therefore, I would go to all those locations where we had fun in our childhood.
I hope to see you soon.
